module.name: Dictation
module.changelog: *15.0.7* Packaging of ver 15.0.7 *15.0.6* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.5* FREEPBX-19911 Enable Dictation option is broken, Not able to enable the dictation service in FreePBX 15 *15.0.3* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* 15 Backup
module.description: This uses the app_dictate module of Asterisk to let users record dictate into their phones. When complete, the dictations can be emailed to an email address specified in the extension page.
